# jelly-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                                          | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`       | `checked`       | checked property that can be used to get/set the value. Accepts only boolean valuess | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`      | disabled property that can be used to get/set the value. Accepts only boolean values | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Indeterminate state & property of checkbox                                           | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`         | `label`         | label attribute that can be used to set the label text                               | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event    | Description                                                           | Type                |
| -------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `change` | This is an event that is emitted when the state of the box is changed | `CustomEvent<void>` |
